title: Having a tech issue
body:
Hi

I read through the "experiencing a tech problem" thread but I couldn't find a similar resolution to my problem. 
I continually get timed out using any part of the league client whether it be in game, using chat or pre game lobby. 
Every 30 seconds I will lose connection and get the "attempting to reconnect" message, followed by a 3-4 seconds of delay until it catches up. I've had this issue 2-3 times over the last year and it goes away and comes back again. I just wanna know if there are only temporary fixes to this or if i can permanently fix it.
Also I read in another regions forum to solve this issue you go to "run", "services.msc", right click "ip helper" and turn it off. Followed by restarting the client. This had no effect for me. 
Any suggestions or help would be great thanks.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you gone through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) knowledgebase article yet? If not, please run through that and let me know if anything helps.
